title: Third Prince Elmer - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Shounen   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Character Growth   Childcare   Dragons   Heartwarming   Hiding True Identity   Knights   Loyal Subordinates   Magic   Male Protagonist   Master-Servant Relationship   Misunderstandings   R-15   Reincarnation   Royalty   Stoic Characters
author: Sei   せい
description:
A third-year high school boy lost his life due to a disease. When he opened his eyes again, he had turned into a baby.

The Third Prince, whose existence was hidden, could neither talk nor laugh, and was considered a failure. Add in an overprotective servant and a dragon who did things out of his own convenience.

Continuing on living even with repeated misunderstandings. Heartwarming, alternate world life.>
